categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Cav" was the nickname of an Special Commando Advanced Recon Trooper in Task Force 99, a squad within the Galactic Empire's Stormtrooper Corps. Cav served as the squad's melee specialist, capable of attacking targets in close quarters combat. Cav participated in Task Force 99's mission to the Ghost Moon in order to kill a group of Rebels hiding there.
